Type:
  • int
Inherited From:
  • Q.Data#childrenCount

enableSubNetwork :boolean

激活为子网类型，任何图元都可以作为子网类型，设置为子网类型时，当设置画布当前子网为此图元时，画布显示该图元下面的孩子图元
Type:
  • boolean

唯一id
Type:
  • int
Inherited From:
  • Q.Data#id

Methods

addChild(child, index) → {Boolean}

添加孩子，指定孩子序号
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
child Q.Data
index int <optional>
Inherited From:
  • Q.Data#addChild
See:
  • Q.Data#onChildAdd
Returns:
如果添加失败，返回false
Type
Boolean

addUI(ui, bindingProperties)

挂载UI组件到图元组件Q.ElementUI
Parameters:
Name Type Description
ui Q.BaseUI
bindingProperties Object 绑定信息
Example
var node = graph.createNode("node");
var label2 = new Q.LabelUI();
 node.addUI(label2, [{
					property : "label2",
					propertyType : Q.Consts.PROPERTY_TYPE_CLIENT,
					bindingProperty : "data"
				}, {
					property : "label2.color",
					propertyType : Q.Consts.PROPERTY_TYPE_CLIENT,
					bindingProperty : "color"
				}]);
 node.set("label2", "another label");
 node.set("label2.color", Colors.blue);

设置属性，并派发属性变化事件

Name Type Description
key String
value Object
Inherited From:
  • Q.Data#set
See:
  • Q.Data#get
Returns:
如果新属性与原来的属性相同，或者属性设置失败，返回false
Type
Boolean
Example
var data = new Q.Data();
data.set("name", "hello");
data.get("name");
